overview: Little Trip:  Chairperson Ayako and Yuki, who sometimes skips school, become close. They run away.  Rakugaki Uwagaki:  Satomi used to be a member of art club, but she stopped drawing. Due to a cultural festival, she decides to draw again.  Baion:  Kuroi likes recording the sounds of daily life. One day, she meets Rika. Rika begins to enjoy recording the sounds of daily life with Kuroi.
title: Houkago Lost
